text: 2.3 Lom 5.12, Gal 5.16, Kol 3.6, Tat 3.3, 1 Pi 4.3 Ned chɨn mɨdupsek kɨli gelɨgɨpal tek nep gɨl, gos chɨn ke nɨŋɨd kɨdek golɨgɨpun. Gos chɨn ke nɨgup tek gɨlɨg, mapen ke tɨkjakup tek gɨlɨg golɨgɨpun. Chɨn binɨb lum awl tek golɨgɨpun ñɨn anɨb ak, God ne binɨb lum awl okok kɨlop tɨmel nɨŋɨd yul awl ñɨnɨmuŋ ak, chɨnop abe ñɨnɨmuŋ tek lak.
